sentences.en: Amy and her group had driven non-stop through Spain.
sentences.cn: 埃米和她的小组一路马不停蹄地驱车穿越西班牙。

sentences.en: Carlos Sainz of Spain has won the New Zealand Motor Rally.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人卡洛斯·赛恩斯在新西兰摩托车公路大赛中夺冠。

sentences.en: Felipe Gonzalez won a fourth term of office in Spain's election.
sentences.cn: 费利佩·冈萨雷斯在西班牙选举中获得第4次连任。

sentences.en: He has rightly interrupted his holiday in Spain to return to London.
sentences.cn: 他马上中止了在西班牙的度假回到伦敦。

sentences.en: He was drowned in a shipwreck off the coast of Spain.
sentences.cn: 他在西班牙海岸附近的一次海难中溺水身亡。

sentences.en: It was a close run thing before Spain beat Poland 3-2.
sentences.cn: 比赛难分高下，最终西班牙以3比2击败波兰。

sentences.en: Portugal and Spain had possessed vast empires that waxed and waned.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙和西班牙都曾是经历了兴衰的大帝国。

sentences.en: She chose Spain, but personally I'd prefer to go to France.
sentences.cn: 她选择了西班牙，而我个人倒更愿意去法国。

sentences.en: Spain ceded the Philippines to the United States.
sentences.cn: 西班牙将菲律宾群岛割让给美国。

sentences.en: Spain has been one of Cuba's major trading partners.
sentences.cn: 西班牙一直是古巴的主要贸易伙伴之一。

sentences.en: Spain imposed levies on farm imports from non-member states.
sentences.cn: 西班牙对来自非成员国的进口农产品征税。

sentences.en: Spain is a composite of multifarious traditions and people.
sentences.cn: 西班牙是多种传统和多个民族的合成体。

sentences.en: Spain may well look different but the changes are superficial.
sentences.cn: 西班牙可能看起来与以前有很大不同，但这些变化都是表面上的。

sentences.en: Spain's top priority is the signing of an EMU treaty.
sentences.cn: 西班牙的当务之急是签署《欧洲经济和货币联盟条约》。

sentences.en: Spaniards are worried about German investors deserting Spain for Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人担心德国投资者放弃西班牙而转向东欧。

sentences.en: The painting was returned to Spain on a temporary import licence.
sentences.cn: 这幅画凭着临时进口许可证被送回了西班牙。

sentences.en: They are currently taking a short break in Spain.
sentences.cn: 他们目前正在西班牙休短假。

sentences.en: This island was ceded to Spain more than one hundred years ago.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿在一百多年以前就割让给西班牙了。
